ygData.msgSnippet: Hydras: But now hissed the male The dragon and tiger will be the symbol of rule and conquest ... mind... ... She was ... to orders, ... ever mission ...

Hydras:

"But now"hissed the male "The dragon and tiger will be the symbol of 
rule and conquest"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 2/24/03 11:20:10 PM Central Standard Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > hydras broke the kiss
> 
> She felt that parting, as her optics focused upon his face. 
> 
> > 
> > "A my dear, Maxima"hissed the male "Do you know what I love in 
> > you??? I love you devil and mercyless spark and your cunning 
mind..."
> > 
> 
> She listened, her optics upon him almost like she was in a trance. 
She was 
> listening. Like she had done so for millions of years; listening 
to orders, 
> waiting upon Megatron, even Galvatron, hand & foot; doing what 
ever mission 
> they asked of her; doing them without question, even though she 
may have 
> hesitated on a couple of them, but nonetheless, she did her 
duty... without 
> question. 
> 
> But to finally hear him praise her... she had waited forever it 
seemed for 
> this. It was her goal in life,... to become his favorite warrior, 
to be his 
> second in command. Commanding the Decepticons was not something 
she strived 
> for, it was a major honor, but... it was to replace Starscream 
that was her 
> goal. Now... would it be possible? There was no Starscream here... 
or so she 
> thought. Last she saw of him was on Cybertron when Galvatron 
incinerated him, 
> then she heard of his return soon after disappearing into deep 
space. She 
> knew he was out there, & found him upon a world as a sort of God 
to 
> fleshlings. But.. it had been many years since she had seen 
Starscream. 
> 
> She gazed at Hydras. In a trance, sort of stunned look. The 
organic side of 
> her felt the rush of emotions surging through her. Emotions she 
was no 
> prepared to experience, let alone experienced at all. 
> 
> Then she smirked, a wicked & dreamy look, "All the better to serve 
you with, 
> mighty Hydras. I am yours... to command as you see fit." A daring 
leap of 
> faith. But sometimes one had to dare to test the limits.
> 
> She realized that she was still clinging to him. Her form against 
his. She 
> smirked. Dare they part each other's company? True, that they 
could devise 
> plots together, but... he did give her a mission. But she would 
wait a little 
> longer before starting that mission. 
> 
> She laughed as a thought approached her. "How coincidental. I do 
believe that 
> there is a Earth creature 'story' or symbol of something called a 
ying & a 
> yang: one is the dragon, the other a tiger. Both were symbols of 
great power &
>  wisdom. If not anything else." informing him as she held onto 
him, gazing at 
> him. Fascinated by him. He was the result of what happened when 
Megatron & 
> Galvatron merged. 
> 
> Her paw-hands went to his faceplate, as she touched him upon both 
sides, she 
> had noticed the difference in their color, slightly. Curiousity 
was what 
> drove her to study him. She wondered if she could touch those 
reminants of 
> both Leaders she once served. As she touched Hydras, her spark 
called out to 
> Megatron & Galvatron. Would they answer in return?
